description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Broccolini Thai Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green curry,Prawn,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Prawn & Broccolini Thai Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion, curry paste, coconut cream, fish sauce, stock, bamboo shoots, carrot, broccolini and 2 cups water in a saucepan over high heat and bring to the boil. Add noodles and prawns and cook for 2-3 minutes or until prawns have changed colour. Stir through juice of 1 lime and divide between bowls. Top with basil and chilli, and serve with lime wedges.
